at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon.drivers.pacificControl

Class PortPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon.drivers.PortCfg
      • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon.drivers.pacificControl.PortPC

  • public class PortPC
extends PortCfg
    Created by siegl on 24.03.2015. This Class represents the configuration of a Sensor/Actor - a Port - on an Gateway G2021. The configuration is stored in a file formated in json. See the apidoc of class PortCfg, for the description of the general config parameters. The section hwCfg and the specific parameters for retrieving data via http are described here. 
     { "portCfg" : [
    { ...
      "hwCfg" : {
              "connection" : "pacificControl" },
              "url" : "http://..." },
              "interval" : "15" },
      ...
      }
 ] }
    On G2021 sedona is installed and running. This installation provied access to sensors (DI, AI) and actors (DO, AO), using http and requesting some specific URLs.
    • connection: pacificControl If the value of this parameter differs, this config is not assigned to the G2021 - the whole entry will be ignored. This config is mandatory.
    • url: http://localhost/... This configuration defines the URL for accessing data from the G2021.
    • interval: 15 The time in seconds how often the http-request should be performed.
      • Zero or negative values or invalid values will be ignored - the default is 30 seconds.
